googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.vbmAbsenteeBallotRules: Any registered Rhode Island voter can request an absentee ballot and vote by mail.
googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.idRequirementsOvr: You can register to vote online if you have a Rhode Island driver's license or state ID card. If not, you can register to vote by mail or in person.
googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.idRequirementsSdr: Bring your Rhode Island driver's license or state ID card with you. If you don't have one, bring ONE photo ID that shows your name, and ONE document that shows your name and current address.  Acceptable documents include a utility bill, bank statement, paycheck, residential lease, or any government document that shows your name and address.
googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.registrationRules:
To register in Rhode Island you must:

  * be a citizen of the United States
  * be a resident of Rhode Island for 30 days preceding the next election
  * be 18 years old by Election Day
  * not be currently incarcerated in a correctional facility due to a felony conviction
  * not have been lawfully judged to be mentally incompetent
